name: Halibut Baked with Sauerkraut
author: Aunt Bea
summary: Who knew they would make great companions AND create their own entree and side dish? This dish is quick, easy, and fresh!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x12-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray
Pat dry halibut fillets with paper towels
Season each side with salt and black pepper
Place fillets in prepared baking dish; top each fillet with sauerkraut
Cover the dish loosely with foil
Bake in the preheated oven until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 12 to 15 minutes
Sprinkle with malt vinegar before serving, if desired
